2010-09-29

Spinning #3: Rock ‘n’ Roll instrumentals

When I was young - before the metal got me - I had a compilation album with a stack of great instrumentals which has long since gone astray and while there are plenty out there none match up - here are a few of my favourites...

Telstar by The Tornados

Scarlett O'Hara by Jet Harris and Tony Meehan

Walk Don't Run by The Ventures

Red River Rock by Johnny & The Hurricanes

FBI by The Shadows

I decided to give this series of posts a title so this is Spinning #3... You can see my previous posts here (including a instrumental that belongs in this post) and here.
